page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area is largely residential council housing, with a variety of industry along Halifax Road & some important recreational sites in Hillsborough. There are several parks & open semi-agricultural land to the north. The accounts which follow seek to reflect this variety and focus particularly on a childs view of the life of a community:- We are very proud to live in Sheffield because of the steel works & the football teams, but there aren't any jobs going because the computers are taking them. Then the only cash you get is the dole. There is nowhere to play as the old people tell us off if we play in the street & we have lots of lorries going up the main road. We sometimes hang around the community centre, but everything else is too expensive.
